p: Antitumor activity was assessed according to the International Working Group (IWG‐2007) criteria except PET assessment for PTCL 19 and modified Severity Weighted Assessment Tool criteria for CTCL. 10 Assessments were carried out within 28 days prior to the start of treatment, 6 weeks after the first dose, and every 6 weeks thereafter, or sooner if there was clinical suspicion of disease progression.
